headline: Is Mondelez a Long Term Opportunity After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: Wondering if Mondelez International is quietly turning into a value opportunity while the market looks the other way? This is the kind of setup that often rewards patient investors. Despite being a global snacks giant, the stock has slipped to around $54.04, down 1.6% over the last week, 5.2% over the past month, and 9.2% year to date. It is roughly 10.1% lower than a year ago but still modestly up 4.7% over five years. Recently, the narrative around consumer staples and packaged food...
